text: @GMB @piersmorgan Wow, is it only me who thinks Piers should replace @BorisJohnson??? I'm not even a UK citizen or a resident and feel this guy is going to war on two fronts. Against Coronavirus and against the government who is indecisive about coronavirus 👏👏👏🙏👌
